thread.title: With Howard back in goal, US loses to Costa Rica 1-0

title: With Howard back in goal, US loses to Costa Rica 1-0
text:
> Top News With Howard back in goal, US loses to Costa Rica 1-0 United States head coach Jurgen Klinsmann reacts during the first half of a international soccer friendly match against Costa Rica, Tuesday, Oct. 13, 2015, in Harrison, N.J. (AP Photo/Julio Cortez)
